Uses of Interface
org.ensor.algorithms.control.pid.IServo

  • Packages that use IServo 
    Package Description
    org.ensor.algorithms.control.pid
    This package contains an implementation of a PID controller.
    org.ensor.robots.differentialdrive
    This package contains the simulation code required to control a robot to follow a particular path laid out by the navigation system.
    org.ensor.robots.motors
    This package refers to motor control interfaces which can be implemented by one or more motor control drivers.
    org.ensor.robots.roboclawdriver
    This package implements a device driver for the RoboClaw motor controller device.

    • Uses of IServo in org.ensor.algorithms.control.pid

      Classes in org.ensor.algorithms.control.pid that implement IServo 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  PIDController
      This class represents a PID controller which is responsible for calculating the appropriate process control output in order to maintain a system at a given setpoint.
      Constructors in org.ensor.algorithms.control.pid with parameters of type IServo 
      Constructor and Description
      PIDController(ISensor aSensor, IServo aController, double aKp, double aKi, double aKd)
      The constructor creates a new PID controller based on the given measurement sensor, the given control output, and the given PID coefficients.
      PIDController(ISensor aSensor, IServo aController, double aKp, double aKi, double aKd, double aMinOutput, double aMaxOutput)
      The constructor creates a new PID controller based on the given measurement sensor, the given control output, and the given PID coefficients.

    • Uses of IServo in org.ensor.robots.differentialdrive

      Methods in org.ensor.robots.differentialdrive that return IServo 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IServo DifferentialDriveServo.getAngleControl() 
      IServo DifferentialDriveServo.getSpeedControl() 
      Constructors in org.ensor.robots.differentialdrive with parameters of type IServo 
      Constructor and Description
      DifferentialDriveServo(Model aDifferentialDriveModel, double aMaxVel, IServo aLeft, IServo aRight) 
      PathServo(double aMaxMovementSpeed, double aDistanceTolerance, double aAngleTolerance, double aDecelerationDistance, IServo aSpeedServo, IServo aDirectionServo, IGoalReachedListener aGoalReachedListener)
      The constructor creates a new path following servo object with the given maximum speed and turn speed in order to place a bound on the speed at which the object will attempt to move.

    • Uses of IServo in org.ensor.robots.motors

      Methods in org.ensor.robots.motors that return IServo 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IServo IComponent.getPositionServo()
      Returns the IServo interface for controlling the position of this servo.
      IServo IComponent.getSpeedServo()
      Returns the speed servo associated with this object.
